Interface yii\debug\components\search\matches\MatcherInterface

All Classes | Methods
Implemented byyii\debug\components\search\matches\Base, yii\debug\components\search\matches\Exact, yii\debug\components\search\matches\Greater, yii\debug\components\search\matches\Lower
Available since version2.0
Source Code
MatcherInterface is the interface that should be implemented by all matchers that will be used in filter.
